entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pukatawagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:41 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
